name: Pharaoh
description:
Immerse yourself in the Ancient Egypt of the Great Pyramids and nurture fledgling villages into thriving Metropolises. Govern all aspects of the exotic Egyptian culture, from religion, to trading with distant cities.

Cultivate vast farms in the Nile valley and discover the most important role of this river, which is its unpredictable floods, played in the life of the Egyptians.

Stone by stone, erect giant monuments, from the Sphinx to the Great Pyramids and create a wondrous beauty for all the Ancient World to admire.

Bring your dynasty through the Old, Middle and New kingdoms of Egypt towards the grandest goal - a Pharaoh of your royal blood!
